Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
A class representing the state of the Board. The board is the only class observed by a view.

    • checkValidLocation

      private static void checkValidLocation​(java.awt.Point location)
      Checks to make sure that the passed in location is within the size of the board.
      Parameters:
      location - The location to check if it is within the board space
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the point is NOT within the board space

    • addSquare

      public void addSquare​(java.awt.Point location, Square square)
      Add a square to board at the given point.
      Parameters:
      location - The location on the board to add to
      square - The square to add
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If trying to add a new square to a location with an existing square

      newLocation - the new location to move the piece to

    • getSquare

      private Square getSquare​(java.awt.Point loc)
      Get a square at the given point from the board. Note: This will return null if the board does not have a square at the point.
      Parameters:
      loc - The location on the square to get
      Returns:
      The square, nullable

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Get a string representation of the board. The String is formatted as squares separated by a "|".
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      The representative string

    • isVictory

      private boolean isVictory()
      Check if all rabbit are in holes.
      Returns:
      If the board is victory

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Two board are equal when they both the the board map and therefor the squares. The max and observer a fields are noe checked.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to test against
      Returns:
      If obj is the same as this

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Get the hashcode for the board. This hashcode is the hashcode of the board map.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      The hashcode
